titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill S. 2372.
Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill S. 2372.

action.text: Mr. Roe (TN) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of S. 2372 (VA MISSION Act of 2018) to amend the title.
